Detailed Description

Static waveshaping functions (no memory).
Mostly saturating functions, some with adjustable waveshape.

Function Documentation

Definition at line 101 of file waveshaper.h.

101 {
102 if (fabs(x) > (2.0 / 3.0)) {
103 return util::sgn(x);
104 } else {
105 return util::sgn(x) * (1.0 - pow(fabs(1.5 * x - util::sgn(x)), p));
106 }

◆ tanh2_fast()

double xdsp::waveshaper::tanh2_fast ( const double x)
inline

Fast polynomial tanh approximation.
https://www.desmos.com/calculator/p94ggpgjhn.

This approximation was proposed by Aleksey Vaneef in this forum post
https://www.kvraudio.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=388650&start=50

  • 0.427% peak relative error
  • Smooth 1st and 2nd derivatives
  • 3rd derivative's magnitude relative to the 1st derivative at discontinuity point around -191 dB
Parameters
xInput sample
Returns
Output sample

Definition at line 30 of file waveshaper.h.

30 {
31 const double x_abs = fabs(x);
32 const double x2 = x * x;
33
34 const double a0 = 2.45550750702956;
35 const double a1 = 0.893229853513558;
36 const double a2 = 0.821226666969744;
37 const double a3 = 2.44506634652299;
38 const double a4 = 0.814642734961073;
39
40 const double p0 = (a0 + a0 * x_abs + (a1 + a2 * x_abs) * x2);
41 const double p1 = (a3 + (a3 + x2) * fabs(x + a4 * x * x_abs));
42
43 return (x * p0 / p1);
44}

◆ two_stage_quad()

double xdsp::waveshaper::two_stage_quad ( double x)

Two stage quadratic soft clipping.
https://www.desmos.com/calculator/xy9fwp7h4k.

Parameters
xInput sample
Returns
Output sample

Definition at line 116 of file waveshaper.h.

116 {
117 const double lower = 1.0 / 3.0;
118 const double upper = 2.0 / 3.0;
119 const double x_abs = fabs(x);
120
121 if (x_abs > upper) {
122 return util::sgn(x);
123 } else if ((lower <= x_abs) && (x_abs <= upper)) {
124 return util::sgn(x) * (3.0 - pow(2.0 - fabs(3.0 * x), 2.0)) / 3.0;
125 } else {
126 return 2.0 * x;
127 }
128}
